headline: Wedbush Just Added These Two Tech Stocks to Its 'Best Ideas' List
summary: Analysts at Wedbush on Monday added MongoDB and Palo Alto Networks, the software and cybersecurity outfits, respectively, to their 14-company list, citing their potential to benefit from booming artificial intelligence demand.

headline: Palo Alto Networks added to Wedbush Best Idea List, sees golden buying opportunity
summary: Investing.com -- Wedbush analysts have added Palo Alto Networks to their Best Ideas List, calling it “one of our top cyber security names” as the company accelerates its platformization strategy.

raw.headline: Palo Alto Networks added to Wedbush Best Idea List, sees golden buying opportunity

headline: Zscaler CEO says companies need AI to fight AI threats
summary: Zscaler CEO Jay Chaudhry warns AI is making cyber attacks faster and more dangerous.
